# YCPython


## Getting started
```
git clone https://gitlab.com/ycyang/YCPython.git
```

## Upload files
```
git add *
git commit -m "some message"
git push -uf origin main
```

## Local directory --> GitLab

```
cd existing_repo
git remote add origin https://gitlab.com/ycyang/YCPython.git
git branch -M main
git push -uf origin main
```

## GitLab --> Local
```
git pull origin main
```
